edu.cnm.deepdive.videopoker.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.videopoker.model.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    This class contains information for the state of the game being currently played. It does not contain any information about the paytable - the specific hands and the rules to evaluate them. It only contains information about the deck being used, the hand being played with, and the credits the user is playing with.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(int purse, double creditValue, Random rng)
      Creation of the game object sets the credits and their worth, creates a deck based on the Random object given, and deals from that deck to a new hand.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(int purse,
            double creditValue,
            Random rng)
        Creation of the game object sets the credits and their worth, creates a deck based on the Random object given, and deals from that deck to a new hand.
        Parameters:
        purse - the amount of credits to start playing with.
        creditValue - the monetary worth of each credit, assumed to be in US dollars.
        rng - the random number generation object to be passed into the deck for shuffling.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeck

        public Deck getDeck()
        Returns:
        the deck used in the game in its current state.

      • getPlayerHand

        public PlayerHand getPlayerHand()
        Returns:
        the player's hand used in the game in its current state.

      • setPlayerHand

        public void setPlayerHand(PlayerHand playerHand)
        Parameters:
        playerHand - a new hand to assign to the hand currently used in the game.

      • getCreditValue

        public double getCreditValue()
        Returns:
        the monetary value of a credit in the current game.

      • getPurse

        public int getPurse()
        Returns:
        the current number of credits in the game.

      • setPurse

        public void setPurse(int purse)
        Parameters:
        purse - the number of credits to change the purse to.

      • getBet

        public int getBet()
        Returns:
        the current bet.

      • setBet

        public void setBet(int bet)

      • getWin

        public int getWin()
        Returns:
        the amount won in a game.

      • setWin

        public void setWin(int win)
        Parameters:
        win - the amount to assign to the win value of the game.
